thread.title: Debt-Fueled Bond Buying in China Raises Concerns
thread.title_full: Debt-Fueled Bond Buying in China Raises Concerns - WSJ

author: Fiona Law
title: Debt-Fueled Bond Buying in China Raises Concerns
text:
Debt-fueled trading drove the boom and bust in Chinese stocks. Now the strategy has shifted to the Chinese bond market, where investors are borrowing record amounts of money using bonds as collateral.
Many Chinese investors are using these bond-backed loans to buy more bonds, analysts say, helping drive up debt issuance and pushing yields to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
